summary: REQ-2 appears implemented (favicon.svg added and linked in index.html). REQ-1 is partially evidenced (Blog page renders cards from a static array with labeled “Problem:”/“Solution:”), but the diff is truncated such that the exact count of 15 entries and exact user-provided text cannot be fully verified, and the /blog route wiring is not shown in the provided diffs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Visiting /blog renders a list/grid of exactly 15 entries (static content, no backend fetching/initialization).
missing_requirements.reason: The static blog content file is truncated in the diff; only entries 1–13 are visible, so the presence of exactly 15 entries cannot be confirmed from provided evidence. Also, the routing for /blog is not shown in the diff summary, so it cannot be confirmed that /blog maps to this updated page.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/FinanceBlog.tsx (renders from staticProblemSolutionBlogs, but does not show routing)

missing_requirements.requirement: Each entry matches the user-provided Problem → Solution text exactly.
missing_requirements.reason: Because frontend/src/content/staticProblemSolutionBlogs.ts is truncated, the full set of blog entries (and therefore full exact text matching) cannot be verified from the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional favicon PNG links in index.html (16x16 and 32x32 generated PNG favicons).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 only requests adding an SVG favicon and wiring it via a single <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/favicon.svg">. The diff shows extra PNG favicon links that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: SEO/OpenGraph/Twitter meta tags, canonical link, and JSON-LD structured data added/modified in index.html.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 or REQ-2; only favicon wiring was requested for index.html changes.
